name: Vestige (itch) (BitPokit Games)
description:
| Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam Entry |

This is our entry for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam! Everything within was developed by two people within the 72 hour time limit. As such, it is loaded with bugs, and many features are absent or incomplete (like sound effects, lol). Still, we hope you enjoy playing! :D

Link to our entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/vestige

| Story |

When the Blight devours another world, all is nearly lost. But in the hollow shell they left behind, a living vestige of the planet's surface survives. With a surge of its mysterious power, the vestige summons from its soil a Steward to act as its protector. Together, they must overcome the Blight if they are to find a way off this dying world...

| Controls | Keyboard & Mouse Required

Due to time constraints for the Game Jam, we were not able to include a tutorial or game control configuration option in the demo. Please refer to this page for controls:

Left Click - Attack

W or Up - Aim/Look up

A or Left - Move left

D or Right - Move right

S or Down - Duck

Space - Jump/Double-jump

Escape/Backspace - Pause

| Changelog |
  • 1.0.2 - Fixed a bug that caused  several issues after reaching the ending
  • 1.0.1 - Fixed an issue that caused player to shrink when ducking
  • 1.0.0 - Game launch
